mapper.select:
/* popImportView.loadImportView*/
SELECT PRJ.PRJCT_NM , SI.SCRIN_NM , SI.SCRIN_ID , SI.CRTR_DATA , SI.SCRIN_KND , DATE_FORMAT(SI.HIST_CHG_DT,'%y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS HIST_CHG_DT FROM T_RE_SIF_005 SI LEFT OUTER JOIN T_RE_PRJ_004 PRJ ON SI.PRJCT_ID = PRJ.PRJCT_ID WHERE SI.SCRIN_SE IN (1, 2) AND SI.MBR_ID = #{mbrId} ORDER BY PRJCT_NM, HIST_CHG_DT
